subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Daytona 500 will be remembered for a rain delay that pushed the race to prime time on Monday, as well as a fiery crash that Juan Pablo Montoya and a truck driver escaped unscathed.
snippet: The Daytona 500 will be remembered for a rain delay that pushed the race to prime time on Monday, as well as a fiery crash that Juan Pablo Montoya and a truck driver escaped unscathed.
